API Reference

This API is in beta. Breaking changes may occur.

Authentication

Get an API Key

Sign up at the dashboard to get your key.

Configure the Client

client := sdk.NewClient(
    sdk.WithAPIKey(os.Getenv("API_KEY")),
    sdk.WithTimeout(30 * time.Second),
)

Make Your First Request

resp, err := client.Get(ctx, "/users")
if err != nil

Endpoints

All REST endpoints use JSON:

Method Path Description
GET /users List users
POST /users Create user
GET /users/:id Get user detail

GraphQL endpoint: /graphql

query {
  users(first: 10) 
}

Error Codes

Code Meaning
400 Bad request
401 Unauthorized
404 Not found
429 Rate limited
500 Internal error

return

; }
